788960.name: MAR WAR: The Evil Awakens
788960.description:
MAR WAR: The Evil Awakens

ğŸ’ğŸ’ğŸ’ğŸ’ğŸ’ğŸ’ğŸ’ğŸ’


A long time ago... In our galaxy...

Decades after the defeat of the Evil Empire, EARTH and MAR faces a new threat from the Militarised ARMY Z.
For many years, ARMY Z have been experimenting on human subjects to create a powerful mutants army in order to help them conquer the two planets.
With their powerful forces. ARMY Z quickly overpowered the resistance on MAR.

To protect THE TWO PLANETS from this powerful threat. Master spy Lake Walker must return from his exile to join the war...


ğŸ’ğŸ’ğŸ’ğŸ’ğŸ’ğŸ’ğŸ’ğŸ’


OUR GAME'S FEATURES:
- EXPLORE THE PLANET MAR
- FINDING SECRET PATH
- SOLVE PUZZLE TO WIN
- BATTLE MUTANTS AND ARMY Z HIGHLY TRAINED SOILDIERS
